articles.description: South Africa’s Wiaan Mulder declares on 367 not out, passing up the opportunity to break Brian Lara’s record for the highest individual score in a Test innings.
articles.title: Wiaan Mulder declares 33 short of Brian Lara's iconic Test innings record of 400

articles.description: Watch live coverage from day eight of Wimbledon featuring Novak Djokovic, Jannik Sinner and Iga Swiatek.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Djokovic vs De Minaur - watch TV stream, scores & results

articles.description: Tim Merlier pips Jonathan Milan on the line in a sprint finish to win a crash-marred stage three of the Tour de France.
articles.title: Tour de France results: Tim Merlier beats Jonathan Milan in crash-marred stage three

articles.description: The umpire who officiated the match at the centre of Sunday's electronic line-calling controversy at Wimbledon is "having a rest day".
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Umpire Nico Helwerth, from the line-calling controversy match, 'having rest day'

articles.description: World champions Spain face Belgium and try to move closer to securing their place in the quarter-finals of Euro 2025 - follow live scores, radio commentary and updates.
articles.title: Spain vs Belgium LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: Novak Djokovic battles back from a challenging start to overcome an inspired Alex de Minaur and reach the Wimbledon quarter-finals.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Novak Djokovic battles past Alex de Minaur to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Arsenal sporting director Andrea Berta holds face-to-face talks with Sporting in Portugal as the Premier League club move closer towards a deal for striker Viktor Gyokeres.
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres: Arsenal sporting director Andrea Berta travels to Portugal to close in on deal

articles.description: England have "got to" play Jofra Archer in the third Test against India at Lord's, says James Anderson.
articles.title: England vs India: Jofra Archer must play at Lord's - James Anderson

articles.description: Maro Itoje returns to captain the British and Irish Lions against the Brumbies on Wednesday as Andy Farrell's Test team appears to take shape.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Farrell names team for Brumbies

articles.description: Former multiple world champion Ricky Hatton, 46, announces he will fight Eisa Al Dah on 2 December in Dubai, ending his 13-year retirement from boxing.
articles.title: Ricky Hatton: Former world champion announces comeback against Eisa Al Dah in December
